page.title: 20SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: We asked many people what they thought about immigration, and they said that, in their opinion, immigration must be stopped or slowed down, or there will be less jobs around not taken and therefore more unemployment. The farmers are great conservationists and when many of the trees died, due to Dutch Elm Disease,they have replanted many new trees. Every-one is appalled by the recent soccer violence and think that the offenders should be asked why they riot, and then the government should take serious action. People said that Nuclear Power was a good thing, but, although they obviously did not approve of Nuclear weapons, they should be kept as a detterent.
